name: Unity Universe
description:
Unity Universe is an MMORPG game. It has multiple worlds in which your goal is to be the strongest and to explore the world to find treasures that increase your stats.

There will be many difficult challenges to surpass if you wish to become a godly figure.

This game is still in development and is most definitely a work in progress.

The Multiplayer is implemented with the Photon network

I encourage community contributions of any kind to the game!

The goal of this project is to make a multiplayer universe in Unity to hopefully gain a player base and show that Unity is an awesome game engine even for a 3DMMO.

Currently the in-game chat system will be replaced by the Discord Server for Unity Universe: https://discord.gg/cR7rwgw

Controls:

Hold down right mouse button to look around and change direction

Left mouse click to target enemies, players, or items

W : Forward S : Back A : Turn Left D : Turn Right

Q : Attack Spacebar : Jump Return : Accept
